metadata.title: OLD SCHOOL LEGENDS
metadata.description: The Top 150 Classic Artists Who Shaped Music History

artists.name: Michael Jackson
artists.bio: The King of Pop. Best-selling solo artist of all time with 'Thriller' as the world's best-selling album.

artists.name: Tupac Shakur
artists.bio: One of the most influential rappers of all time. Sold over 75 million records worldwide. Cultural icon and activist.

artists.name: The Notorious B.I.G.
artists.bio: Widely considered one of the greatest rappers ever. 'Ready to Die' and 'Life After Death' are certified classics.

artists.name: Queen
artists.bio: British rock legends fronted by Freddie Mercury. 'Bohemian Rhapsody' is one of the most iconic songs ever recorded.

artists.name: Prince
artists.bio: Musical genius who mastered every instrument. 'Purple Rain' is one of the greatest albums in history.

artists.name: Bob Marley
artists.bio: The King of Reggae. Brought Jamaican music to the world and became a global symbol of peace and resistance.

artists.name: Marvin Gaye
artists.bio: The Prince of Soul. 'What's Going On' is considered one of the greatest albums ever made.
signature_songs: I Heard It Through The Grapevine

artists.name: Stevie Wonder
artists.bio: Child prodigy who became one of the most decorated artists ever. 25 Grammy wins and 10 #1 hits.
signature_songs: I Just Called To Say I Love You

artists.name: Led Zeppelin
artists.bio: Pioneers of hard rock and heavy metal. 'Stairway to Heaven' is the most requested song in radio history.

artists.name: N.W.A
artists.bio: Pioneers of gangsta rap. 'Straight Outta Compton' changed hip hop forever and sparked a cultural movement.

artists.name: The Beatles
artists.bio: The most influential band in history. Changed music, culture, and the world itself.

artists.name: Snoop Dogg
artists.bio: West Coast rap icon. 'Doggystyle' was the first debut album to enter the charts at #1.

artists.name: Dr. Dre
artists.bio: The architect of West Coast hip hop. Producer extraordinaire who launched Eminem, 50 Cent, and Kendrick Lamar.

artists.name: Whitney Houston
artists.bio: The Voice. Most awarded female artist of all time with one of the greatest vocal ranges in history.
signature_songs: Saving All My Love For You

artists.name: Nirvana
artists.bio: Killed hair metal and birthed grunge. 'Smells Like Teen Spirit' defined a generation.

artists.name: Jay-Z
artists.bio: Hip hop's first billionaire. 'Reasonable Doubt' and 'The Blueprint' are certified classics.

artists.name: Nas
artists.bio: 'Illmatic' is widely considered the greatest hip hop album of all time. Queensbridge legend.

artists.name: Aretha Franklin
artists.bio: The Queen of Soul. 18 Grammy wins and the voice that defined soul music.

artists.name: Guns N' Roses
artists.bio: 'Appetite for Destruction' is the best-selling debut album in US history. Rock and roll excess personified.

artists.name: Run-D.M.C.
artists.bio: First hip hop act with a gold album. 'Walk This Way' with Aerosmith broke down racial barriers in music.

artists.name: Elton John
artists.bio: One of the best-selling music artists of all time. Over 300 million records sold worldwide.

artists.name: Eminem
artists.bio: Best-selling artist of the 2000s. The Rap God with unprecedented lyrical complexity.

artists.name: David Bowie
artists.bio: The Chameleon of Rock. Reinvented himself endlessly across 5 decades of groundbreaking music.

artists.name: Wu-Tang Clan
artists.bio: Staten Island collective that revolutionized hip hop. 'Enter the Wu-Tang' is a stone-cold classic.
signature_songs: Wu-Tang Clan Ain't Nuthing ta Fuck Wit

artists.name: Madonna
artists.bio: The Queen of Pop. Best-selling female recording artist of all time with 300+ million records sold.

artists.name: Fleetwood Mac
artists.bio: Rumours is one of the best-selling albums of all time.

artists.name: Pink Floyd
artists.bio: Pioneers of progressive rock. Dark Side of the Moon spent 937 weeks on Billboard.

artists.name: The Rolling Stones
artists.bio: The greatest rock and roll band in the world. Still touring after 60 years.

artists.name: AC/DC
artists.bio: Back in Black is the second best-selling album ever.
signature_songs: You Shook Me All Night Long

artists.name: Aerosmith
artists.bio: America's greatest rock band with a career spanning 50+ years.
signature_songs: I Don't Want to Miss a Thing

artists.name: James Brown
artists.bio: The Godfather of Soul. Created funk and influenced everyone.
signature_songs: Papa's Got a Brand New Bag
It's a Man's Man's Man's World

artists.name: The Temptations
artists.bio: Motown legends with 4 #1 hits and 14 #1 R&B singles.
signature_songs: The Way You Do the Things You Do

artists.name: Diana Ross
artists.bio: Supreme leader of The Supremes and solo icon.
signature_songs: Stop! In the Name of Love

artists.name: Donna Summer
artists.bio: The Queen of Disco. Defined an entire era of dance music.

artists.name: Earth, Wind & Fire
artists.bio: Fusion of funk, soul, jazz, and pop that defined the sound of a decade.

artists.name: Bee Gees
artists.bio: Saturday Night Fever soundtrack sold 40 million copies.

artists.name: ABBA
artists.bio: Sweden's greatest export. 400 million records sold.

artists.name: Lionel Richie
artists.bio: Solo success after The Commodores. Hello is iconic.

artists.name: Billy Joel
artists.bio: The Piano Man. One of the best-selling artists of all time.

artists.name: Bruce Springsteen
artists.bio: The Boss. Born in the U.S.A. sold 30 million copies.

artists.name: Eric Clapton
artists.bio: Guitar god. Only 3-time Rock Hall inductee.

artists.name: The Who
artists.bio: British Invasion legends. Tommy and Who's Next are masterpieces.

artists.name: The Eagles
artists.bio: Hotel California is the third best-selling album in US history.

artists.name: Bon Jovi
artists.bio: 130 million records sold. 'Livin' on a Prayer' is an anthem.
signature_songs: You Give Love a Bad Name

artists.name: Van Halen
artists.bio: Eddie Van Halen redefined electric guitar.

artists.name: Metallica
artists.bio: The biggest metal band in history. Black Album sold 30 million.

artists.name: Iron Maiden
artists.bio: British heavy metal icons. Still headlining stadiums.

artists.name: Black Sabbath
artists.bio: Invented heavy metal. Ozzy is the Prince of Darkness.

artists.name: Def Leppard
artists.bio: Hysteria sold 25 million copies worldwide.

artists.name: Journey
artists.bio: Don't Stop Believin' is the most downloaded 20th century song.

artists.name: Public Enemy
artists.bio: Revolutionary hip hop. Fight the Power changed music.
signature_songs: Black Steel in the Hour of Chaos

artists.name: A Tribe Called Quest
artists.bio: Jazz-rap pioneers. Low End Theory is a masterpiece.

artists.name: Outkast
artists.bio: Atlanta duo who pushed hip hop into new territory.

artists.name: The Roots
artists.bio: Live instrumentation in hip hop. Questlove is a legend.

artists.name: Ice Cube
artists.bio: N.W.A member turned solo icon and actor.

artists.name: Scarface
artists.bio: Geto Boys legend. The Diary is a southern classic.

artists.name: DMX
artists.bio: First artist to debut at #1 five times consecutively.
signature_songs: X Gon' Give It to Ya

artists.name: LL Cool J
artists.bio: First hip hop artist with a string of hits across decades.

artists.name: Beastie Boys
artists.bio: Licensed to Ill was first hip hop album to top Billboard.

artists.name: De La Soul
artists.bio: Alternative hip hop pioneers with creative sampling.
signature_songs: A Roller Skating Jam Named Saturdays

artists.name: Cypress Hill
artists.bio: Latin hip hop pioneers. Signature nasal flow.
signature_songs: How I Could Just Kill a Man

artists.name: Mobb Deep
artists.bio: Queensbridge duo. The Infamous is a hardcore classic.

artists.name: Big Daddy Kane
artists.bio: Smooth flow pioneer. Influenced Jay-Z and Nas.

artists.name: Rakim
artists.bio: The God MC. Revolutionized lyrical complexity.

artists.name: Slick Rick
artists.bio: The Ruler. Master storyteller of hip hop.

artists.name: Tina Turner
artists.bio: Queen of Rock and Roll. Ultimate comeback story.
signature_songs: What's Love Got to Do with It

artists.name: Janet Jackson
artists.bio: Control and Rhythm Nation defined pop innovation.

artists.name: Anita Baker
artists.bio: Quiet storm queen with an 8-Grammy career.
signature_songs: Giving You the Best That I Got

artists.name: Luther Vandross
artists.bio: The velvet voice of R&B. 8 consecutive platinum albums.
signature_songs: A House Is Not a Home

artists.name: Teddy Pendergrass
artists.bio: First male artist with 5 consecutive platinum albums.
signature_songs: If You Don't Know Me by Now
You're My Latest, My Greatest Inspiration

artists.name: Al Green
artists.bio: Silky smooth voice defined Memphis soul.
signature_songs: I'm Still in Love with You

artists.name: Sade
artists.bio: British-Nigerian band with smooth sophistication.

artists.name: Chaka Khan
artists.bio: Queen of Funk with a four-octave range.

artists.name: Patti LaBelle
artists.bio: The Godmother of Soul. Power vocals personified.

artists.name: Gladys Knight
artists.bio: The Empress of Soul. Midnight Train is timeless.
signature_songs: Best Thing That Ever Happened to Me
I Heard It Through the Grapevine

artists.name: Smokey Robinson
artists.bio: Motown songwriter and performer extraordinaire.

artists.name: The Isley Brothers
artists.bio: Multi-decade legends spanning soul, funk, and R&B.

artists.name: Parliament-Funkadelic
artists.bio: George Clinton's mothership of funk.

artists.name: Jimi Hendrix
artists.bio: Greatest guitarist of all time. Changed electric guitar forever.

artists.name: Janis Joplin
artists.bio: Queen of psychedelic soul. Raw emotional power.

artists.name: The Doors
artists.bio: Jim Morrison's poetry and psychedelic rock.

artists.name: Creedence Clearwater Revival
artists.bio: Swamp rock pioneers with timeless hits.
signature_songs: Have You Ever Seen the Rain

artists.name: Simon & Garfunkel
artists.bio: Folk-rock poetry. Bridge Over Troubled Water is perfection.

artists.name: Joni Mitchell
artists.bio: Blue is considered one of the greatest albums ever.

artists.name: Neil Young
artists.bio: Godfather of grunge. Heart of Gold to Rust Never Sleeps.

artists.name: Tom Petty
artists.bio: Heartbreaker. Classic American rock.

artists.name: Bob Dylan
artists.bio: Nobel Prize winner. Changed songwriting forever.

artists.name: Elvis Presley
artists.bio: The King. Best-selling solo artist in history.

artists.name: Ray Charles
artists.bio: The Genius. Father of soul music.

artists.name: Sam Cooke
artists.bio: King of Soul. Pioneered the genre.
signature_songs: Bring It On Home to Me

artists.name: Otis Redding
artists.bio: King of Soul. Dock of the Bay is immortal.
signature_songs: (Sittin' On) The Dock of the Bay

artists.name: Curtis Mayfield
artists.bio: Superfly soundtrack and socially conscious soul.

artists.name: The Jackson 5
artists.bio: Motown's biggest act. Launched Michael.

artists.name: The Supremes
artists.bio: Most successful Motown act of the '60s.
signature_songs: Stop! In the Name of Love

artists.name: Kool & The Gang
artists.bio: Celebration is the party anthem forever.

artists.name: Barry White
artists.bio: The Walrus of Love. Deep voice extraordinaire.
signature_songs: Can't Get Enough of Your Love, Babe
You're the First, the Last, My Everything
I'm Gonna Love You Just a Little More Baby
Never, Never Gonna Give Ya Up

artists.name: Isaac Hayes
artists.bio: Shaft soundtrack. Oscar winner.

artists.name: Rick James
artists.bio: Super Freak. Buffalo funk legend.

artists.name: Grandmaster Flash
artists.bio: Pioneer of DJing. The Message is landmark hip hop.
signature_songs: The Adventures of Grandmaster Flash on the Wheels of Steel

artists.name: Eric B. & Rakim
artists.bio: Paid in Full changed hip hop production.

artists.name: EPMD
artists.bio: Strictly Business. Funk sampling pioneers.

artists.name: Salt-N-Pepa
artists.bio: First female rap act with gold and platinum albums.

artists.name: MC Lyte
artists.bio: Pioneer of female hip hop. First female solo gold album.

artists.name: Queen Latifah
artists.bio: All Hail the Queen. Hip hop royalty turned Oscar nominee.

artists.name: Missy Elliott
artists.bio: Revolutionary producer and visionary artist.

artists.name: Lauryn Hill
artists.bio: The Miseducation is one of the greatest albums ever.

artists.name: Mary J. Blige
artists.bio: Queen of Hip Hop Soul.

artists.name: TLC
artists.bio: Best-selling female group in US history.

artists.name: En Vogue
artists.bio: Harmonies and style. Funky Divas.
signature_songs: Give It Up, Turn It Loose

artists.name: Boyz II Men
artists.bio: Best-selling R&B group ever. End of the Road.
signature_songs: It's So Hard to Say Goodbye to Yesterday

artists.name: New Edition
artists.bio: Launched Bobby Brown, Bell Biv DeVoe, and Johnny Gill.

artists.name: R. Kelly
artists.bio: I Believe I Can Fly. Controversial legacy.
signature_songs: Step in the Name of Love

artists.name: Keith Sweat
artists.bio: New Jack Swing pioneer.

artists.name: Bobby Brown
artists.bio: King of New Jack Swing.

artists.name: Bell Biv DeVoe
artists.bio: New Edition splinter. Poison is iconic.
signature_songs: When Will I See You Smile Again

artists.name: Guy
artists.bio: Teddy Riley invented New Jack Swing.

artists.name: Jodeci
artists.bio: Forever My Lady. Uptown's finest.

artists.name: SWV
artists.bio: Sisters with Voices. Weak is a classic.

artists.name: Destiny's Child
artists.bio: Launched Beyonc. Survivor era dominance.

artists.name: Usher
artists.bio: My Way and Confessions era superstardom.

artists.name: R.E.M.
artists.bio: Alternative rock pioneers. Losing My Religion.
signature_songs: It's the End of the World

artists.name: U2
artists.bio: The Joshua Tree. One of the biggest bands ever.
signature_songs: Where the Streets Have No Name

artists.name: The Police
artists.bio: Sting's band. Reggae-rock fusion.
signature_songs: Don't Stand So Close to Me
Every Little Thing She Does Is Magic

artists.name: Depeche Mode
artists.bio: Synthpop pioneers. Massive global influence.

artists.name: New Order
artists.bio: Blue Monday is the best-selling 12-inch ever.

artists.name: The Cure
artists.bio: Goth rock legends. Robert Smith is iconic.

artists.name: The Smiths
artists.bio: Morrissey and Marr. Defined alternative rock.
signature_songs: There Is a Light That Never Goes Out
The Boy with the Thorn in His Side

artists.name: Joy Division
artists.bio: Ian Curtis. Unknown Pleasures is legendary.

artists.name: Talking Heads
artists.bio: David Byrne's art-rock revolution.

artists.name: Blondie
artists.bio: Debbie Harry. Heart of Glass.

artists.name: Eurythmics
artists.bio: Annie Lennox's voice. Sweet Dreams.

artists.name: Pet Shop Boys
artists.bio: Best-selling duo in UK history.
signature_songs: What Have I Done to Deserve This?

artists.name: Hall & Oates
artists.bio: Best-selling duo of all time.

artists.name: Phil Collins
artists.bio: Genesis frontman. Solo superstar.

artists.name: Genesis
artists.bio: Peter Gabriel era to Phil Collins era.

artists.name: Peter Gabriel
artists.bio: So is a masterpiece. Sledgehammer.

artists.name: Kate Bush
artists.bio: Running Up That Hill. Visionary artist.
signature_songs: The Man with the Child in His Eyes

artists.name: Toto
artists.bio: Africa. Session musician supergroup.

artists.name: Foreigner
artists.bio: Power ballad specialists.
signature_songs: I Want to Know What Love Is
Waiting for a Girl Like You

artists.name: REO Speedwagon
artists.bio: Keep On Loving You. Arena rock.

artists.name: Chicago
artists.bio: Horn-driven rock. Hard to Say I'm Sorry.

artists.name: Steely Dan
artists.bio: Sophisticated jazz-rock. Aja is perfect.

artists.name: George Michael
artists.bio: Faith era. Solo after Wham!

artists.name: Wham!
artists.bio: George Michael's early days.
signature_songs: Wake Me Up Before You Go-Go

artists.name: Duran Duran
artists.bio: New Romantic leaders. MTV icons.

artists.name: Culture Club
artists.bio: Boy George. Karma Chameleon.
signature_songs: Do You Really Want to Hurt Me

artists.name: Cyndi Lauper
artists.bio: Girls Just Want to Have Fun. True Colors.
signature_songs: Girls Just Want to Have Fun

artists.name: Pat Benatar
artists.bio: Female rock trailblazer. Hit Me with Your Best Shot.
signature_songs: Hit Me with Your Best Shot

artists.name: Heart
artists.bio: Wilson sisters. Barracuda.
